name: Meet Me at the Altar
description: '''Meet Me at the Altar''' (stylized as '''Meet Me @ the Altar''') is an American [[pop-punk]] band formed in 2015. Initially, the three members—all of whom lived in different states at the time—worked on music remotely through the internet. The band went on their first tour in 2018, and were signed by [[Fueled by Ramen]] in 2020.
